strow.stentry: This property defines whether or not to add at the end of each matrix row an additional cell with aggregate values for the row. Default is True.
This property defines whether or not to add at the bottom of each matrix column an additional cell with aggregate values for the column. Default is True.
This property defines whether or not to add to the bottom right of the matrix an additional cell with aggregate values for the whole matrix. Default is True.
Possibility to specify a class. This property allows you to change the matrix rendering.

section.title: Description
section.p: A description of the matrix can be provided in this section.

strow.stentry: This property allows you to write to the logs the data handled by udp. The log level must be set to DEBUG to see the data.
The technical id of the matrix.
The reference of the table model used by this module.

section.title: Transformation
section.p: On the Keep Filter tab, the user can define filters to be applied on the data before building the matrix.
On the Extra tab, data used to create Events can be defined.
